```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

Load the Data
```{r}
data <- read.csv("data/thermocouple_actualdata.csv")
data$time <- data$Ã¯..Time
data$Depth <- as.factor(data$Depth)
```

Load Libraries 
```{r, echo = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(plotly)
library(htmlwidgets)
```

Plot for Bare 450 with the model 450
```{r, echo = FALSE}
bare450 <- ggplot(data %>% filter(Temperature.1 > 10, time <60, ID == c("Bare450", "Model450")), aes(x = time, y = Temperature.1, shape = Depth, color = Sample)) + geom_point(alpha = 0.5, size = 0.3)

ggplotly(bare450)

```

Plot for Bare 600 with the model 600
```{r, echo = FALSE}
bare600 <- ggplot(data %>% filter(Temperature.1 > 10, time <60, ID == c("Bare600", "Model600")), aes(x = time, y = Temperature.1, shape = Depth, color = Sample)) + geom_point(alpha = 0.5, size = 0.3)

ggplotly(bare600)

```

Plot for BSC 450 with the model 450
```{r}
bsc450 <- ggplot(data %>% filter(Temperature.1 > 10, time <60, ID == c("BSC450", "Model450")), aes(x = time, y = Temperature.1, shape = Depth, color = Sample)) + geom_point(alpha = 0.5, size = 0.3)

ggplotly(bsc450)

```

Plot for BSC 600 with the model 600
```{r}
bsc600 <- ggplot(data %>% filter(Temperature.1 > 10, time <60, ID == c("BSC600", "Model600")), aes(x = time, y = Temperature.1, shape = Depth, color = Sample)) + geom_point(alpha = 0.5, size = 0.3)

ggplotly(bsc600)

```
